name: pyscf_front
description: A quantum chemical calculation app using Electron, React, and Python.

scripts.dev: rimraf dist && npm run codegen && run-p dev:webpack dev:electron
scripts.build: npm run codegen && npm run build:webpack && npm run build:conda-pack && npm run build:python
scripts.build:conda-pack: rimraf conda_env && bash -c 'source $HOME/miniforge3/etc/profile.d/conda.sh && conda activate pyscf-env && conda-pack -o conda_env.tar.gz && mkdir -p conda_env && tar -xzf conda_env.tar.gz -C conda_env && rm conda_env.tar.gz'
scripts.build:python: rimraf python_dist && cd src/python && bash -c 'source $HOME/miniforge3/etc/profile.d/conda.sh && conda activate pyscf-env && pyinstaller --distpath ../../python_dist --workpath ../../build/pyinstaller --noconfirm pyscf_front_api.spec'
scripts.codegen: npm run codegen:python && npm run codegen:typescript
scripts.codegen:python: cd src/python && bash -c 'source $HOME/miniforge3/etc/profile.d/conda.sh && conda activate pyscf-env && datamodel-codegen --input ../../src/api-spec/openapi.yaml --output generated_models.py --output-model-type pydantic_v2.BaseModel --field-constraints --use-schema-description'
scripts.verify-env: bash -c 'source $HOME/miniforge3/etc/profile.d/conda.sh && conda activate pyscf-env && python scripts/verify-environment.py'

author: kam6y
